entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Canceling `JSHost.ImportAsync` fails because `dynamic_import` in `invoke-js.ts` is not cancelable #80028
  • FileInfo.Createtime seem to be wrong (.Net 6 on Linux) #80023
  • [mono] WriteAsyncEnumerable_LongRunningEnumeration_Cancellation and MultipleThreadsLooping much slower on Mono #80020
  • [mono] TestUserCredentialsPropertiesOnWindows fails with "Token cannot be zero." #80019
  • [mono] PatternsDataSet_ConstructRegexForAll_SourceGenerated much slower on Mono #80018
  • Execution of PublishSingleFile assembly crashes with "Failed to create CoreCLR, HRESULT: 0x80004005" #80017
  • dotnet publish -c release -r osx-x64 -p:UseAppHost=true -p:PublishSingleFile=true won't work for net6.0-macos #80016
  • System.Data.Odbc bug for connect IRISDB through odbc for unixodbc #80015
  • [API Proposal]: Support array format string #80014
  • System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.Tests timing out in the CI on x64 macOS #80010
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'cls != nullptr && !isInvalidHandle(cls)' #80006
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Cannot Bind LdapConnection to multiple servers on Linux #79653
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT did not produce code for contstructor #80002
  • Delete ProcessXmlBase.cs #79802
    8.0.0
  • [ARM32] Display wrong register number for double registers #8121
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Replace the last two SIMDIntrinsic in LIR with NamedIntrinsic and delete GT_SIMD #80027
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Clarify INumber.IsPositive and INumber.IsNegative documentation #80026
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Add structural equality and order comparison for common collections #80025
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [build] Use MonoWasmBuildVariant to select runtime variant #80024
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Perform one extra alloc+memcpy #80012
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix crash in fixer on certain invalid patterns #80007
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions

Merged

  • [mono] Reuse handles inside a loop in reflection_create_dynamic_metho… #79716
    area-System.Reflection-mono
  • Move remaining HIR SIMDIntrinsics to SimdAsHWIntrinsic #79720
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Trying to fix firefox flaky tests on CI. #75090
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix/multi server ldap binding linux #79657
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Add missing JitDump for LowerStoreLocCommon #80008
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix generic dataflow for generic virtual methods #80009
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete ProcessXmlBase #79980
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix the ARM's `double` register name displayed in JitDisasm/JitDump #79949
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Make System.Reflection.Emit public types abstract #78544
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][wasm] Bundle assemblies as WebCIL #79416
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Make textual stack trace metadata smaller #79921
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Adding support to receive evaluationOptions from dap. #71464
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Double IndexOf throughput for chars #78861
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Disable outerloop tests on mono/mobile and fix timeout in sendtohelixhelp.proj #79885
  • Refactoring tests to support both external and loopback servers #74579
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • delete enum support for bool as an underlying type #79962
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Report FOH segments #79985
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] createdump: only dump committed memory #79983
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] CreateDump: Only add pages with committed memory #80005
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Remove framework libraries from ILC package #80003
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Conditional null access produces weird error for nullable value types #66143
  • IDE0031: Null check can be simplified. Use null propagation does nothing. #66141

Closed

  • Rename UI can appear offscreen #65230
    17.5
  • Extract method inside base initializer produces method without return type #65221
  • Autocompletion for `return new …` statement differs between `Task` and `ValueTask` methods #64862
    Backlog
  • How to correctly extract all Statements and all Comment Trivia from `SyntaxBlock`s #61041
    Backlog
  • Allow Multiple Member Selection For Extract Base Class / Pull Members Up #46438
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Correct initial state for nested method nullability analysis #66147
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, 17.5
  • Update StreamJsonRpc #66145
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix Inline Rename Flyout Positioning #66139
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Enable disabled test #66140
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.6 #66146
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.6 #66144
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Cleanup dead MSBuild conditions #66052
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Fix for `return new …` statement differs between `Task` and `ValueTask` methods #66125
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Remove unnecessary `ToList` calls #66142
    Area-IDE, Community, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to release/dev17.6 #66148
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Implement new lookup rules for Primary Constructor parameters #66054
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Block `default(delegate*<void>...enum)` in attributes #66073
    Area-Compilers
  • Reduce amount of stack used by CodeGenerator.EmitInstanceCallExpression #66137
    Area-Compilers
  • Account for SpecificDiagnosticOptions in analyzer driver checks for enabling a disabled by default rule #66087
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Implement Required Members for VB #66084
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Fix state for pattern declarations on subsequent iterations #66136
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Pattern Matching, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.5

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Debugging on Firefox #45796
  • [AOT] Explore Alternatives to MakeGenericType/MakeGenericMethod For Web UI #45795
    .NET 8 Planning
  • IFormFileCollection doesn't bind #45794
  • BL0007 "Component parameters should be auto property" too broad #45793
  • [SignalR-Client-Cpp] Support for LongPolling Transport #45791
  • Minimal APIs : Endpoint route returning 404 not found. #45790
  • Cookie configuration mystery using `AddCookie` and `ConfigureApplicationCookie` #45788
  • BlazorServer.styles.css #45787

Closed

  • Adopt consistent approach for defining InternalsVisibleTo in the repo #41244
    8.0-preview1
  • Perf regression: json #45781
  • Managed way to handle js disposal in blazor-to-js interop #45786
  • Quarantine Http3.Http3TlsTests.OnAuthenticate_Available_Throws #43548
    Test failures
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #45774
  • Perf improvement: plainTextWithFilter #45780

PullRequests

Merged

  • Adopt consistent approach for defining InternalsVisibleTo in the repo #45748
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Updated the ownership of the Mvc area path #45784
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Unquarantine OnAuthenticate_Available_Throws #45789
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Get EmptyHttpResult in RDF via reflection #45354
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks
  • [AOT] Add RequiresDynamicCode annotation to Microsoft.AspNetCore.Routing #45580
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview1
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2075187 #45630
    area-mvc
  • consider escaped commas in LDAP distinguished name #45649
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Add ambiguous route analyzer #45582
    blocked, area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks
  • Fix gRPC template tests #45702
    area-mvc, area-grpc

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TabbedPage Barbackground visual bug when using Linear or Radial GradientBrush #12324
  • .NET MAUI iOS can't debug or publish arm-64 without iossimulator-x64 #12323
  • Need the option to modify the visibility of the XAML code-behind class so as to hide it from library consumers #12322
  • Microsoft.Maui.Platform.HandlerNotFoundException : Handler not found for view Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Maps.Map. #12320
  • Permissions always returns "Granted" for Permissions.Photos in .net MAUI #12319
  • .Net Maui missing DPad for android TV #12318
  • Unable to reflect assembly of MAUI application on macOS #12317
  • Release throws exception with local styles since last VS update #12316
  • [iOS] CarouselView with CollectionView as ItemTemplate: apply HorizontalOptions Content inside carousel card is truncated #12315
  • Shell Navigation in OnAppearing Causes Fault on Windows #12313
  • [Android] Listview Header content disappears while scrolling #12312

Closed

  • Unfocus fixed except for scroll containers #12290
  • Intermittent crash when navigating to a page containing images #9011
  • ImageSource FromFile Android internal bug? #8809
    .NET 7 Planning
  • CollectionView stopped to work after VS update to 17.3.0 Preview 2.0 #8178
  • CollectionView throws Recycled-Exception while loading Images with Web-URL #9712
    Backlog
  • Crash on scrolling collection view #11130
    Backlog
  • Carousel issue - Canvas: trying to use a recycled bitmap android.graphics.Bitmap #10032
    Backlog
  • CarouselView inside CollectionView throws Java.Lang.RuntimeException: 'Canvas: trying to use a recycled bitmap' #11519
    Backlog
  • Android keyboard accessibility skipping control #12314
  • Toolbar Secondary Items Displaying like Primary Items in IOS #12140
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Initial Commit for third party notice file #12321

Merged

  • [android] remove Xamarin.AndroidX.Legacy.Support.V4 #12232
  • Update image source after recycling bitmap in custom target #12310
    area/image :framed_picture:

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix Entry Next Keyboard Button Finds Next TextField #11914
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Notify CheckBox Foreground update after Color changed (alternative) #12102
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-checkbox
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #12123
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
